extendedInfo.description: THE FATE OF THE GALAXY LIES IN THE BALANCE!From the makers of the critically acclaimed Dead Space on Android comes an all-new, original Mass Effect storyline â made exclusively for mobile! ** This game is MASSIVE (over 450MB)! We recommend connecting to WiFi to speed up your download. **** Now with a free MASS kicking wallpaper â exclusive to Google Play. **YOUâRE A CERBERUS AGENT â GONE ROGUE!As Commander Shepard battles Reapers across the galaxy, veteran Cerberus agent Randall Ezno procures aliens for illicit experiments at a secret facility. But when the Director of the facility goes too far - Randall fights back and vows to bring Cerberus down! Can you fight your way off the hostile Cerberus base and deliver their secret research to the Alliance?  ENTER A NEW DIMENSION IN ANDROID  GAMINGMove freely through massive exteriors and a fully realized Cerberus base. Featuring groundbreaking graphics and intensified audio, enjoy a console-like experience that marks the next leap in Android gameplay.ENGAGE ENEMIES WITH SWIPE & TAP COMBATFeaturing both manual and assisted aiming, use intuitive tap controls and for fast-paced fighting. Fluidly dive and roll for cover with a simple swipe. Engage in epic boss battles against Cerberus Mechs and twisted experiment victims. Simply disable the "tap-to-aim" function in the Options section to try it.ITâS YOU AGAINST AN ARMY!Harness the fury of high-tech armor and weapons. Unleash biotic powers, stealth cloak abilities and devastating melee attacks. Upgrade your gear and performance with credits â the quicker and more stylish your kills, the more credits youâll earn. Also, access the bonus Turian mission and escape the medical bay...alive!IMPACT YOUR MASS EFFECT 3 EXPERIENCEGather valuable intel and upload it to Galaxy at War to boost your Galactic Readiness Rating in Mass Effect 3. Complete the game to increase your War Assets. Improve your chances in the final Mass Effect 3 battle â on the go! Crush Cerberus and shape the future of the galaxy. The outcome depends on YOU in Mass Effect: Infiltrator!Be the first to know! Get inside EA info on great deals, plus the latest game updates, tips & moreâ¦VISIT US: eamobile.com/androidFOLLOW US: twitter.com/eamobileLIKE US: facebook.com/eamobileWATCH US: youtube.com/eamobilegamesCheck out more exciting games from EA like The Sims FreePlay, Need for Speed Most Wanted, Theme Park, World Series of Poker, and FIFA 12!For more information about the third party targeted ad serving and analytics technology in this app and data they collect, see End User License Agreement:http://tos.ea.com/legalapp/mobileeula/US/en/GM/

reviews.title: What?
reviews.comment: I can\'t believe I paid 25 cents for this. Two stars because it looks good and it\'s an interesting idea. It\'s not really a fps,  and the arcade style combat only works some of the time. Go with N.O.V.A 3, it\'s actually worth the money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Superb
reviews.comment: Ran perfectly fine on my nexus 7, I just wish it was a longer game. Absolutely worth the money.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: GTab 10.1
reviews.comment: Minus 2 stars for this. It plays just fine when I side load the app on the tablet. Even runs on my Kindle Fire. But Google Play claims it\'s not compatible with my Tab? C\'mon. And when I click below to go to the help page, there\'s no direct listing for the app. Should be a contact email in the details on here too. Lame.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Like Every Other EA Game....
reviews.comment: Once again, EA Games screws over customers. It\'s companies and developers like this make people want Android apps for free. Game DOES NOT LOAD on Nexus 7. Thankfully I only wasted .25\302\242 Dev doesn\'t care, Google allows these practices to continue. Customers will continue to side load for free because that\'s what as lot of these apps are worth.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nexus 7!!
reviews.comment: Games rocks on the Nexus 7! In game purchases are buggy. Every other purchase works and I am out around 15$ for credits that were stated as failed when attempted to purchase.  3 Stars for expensive buggy in game purchases.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome game
reviews.comment: Its def a great game that makes you want to keep playing until you beat it. Or unlock everything you can customize with. Awesome story line and variety of weapons, skills, and tactics you can choose. Only thing is that it freezes pretty frequently. Would of gave it 5 stars.
reviews.author: Danny Calixto

reviews.title: Can not play
reviews.comment: Can\'t play on my Samsung illusion server error i bought it but can\'t play fix it for this phone please thank you. And it still does not work you guys need to fix please. Hvga version maybe.    Guess u guys don\'t read the reviews it still does not work on samsung illusion.   FIX IT!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost great
reviews.comment: I don\'t normally play computer games, but i find myself playing this one a lot on my original Xoom tablet.  It looks great and is entertaining enough. This would be a five star rating if the game didn\'t crash so often.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: One short mission
reviews.comment: I thought this game would have a little more depth to it, but it\'s I\'ve as soon as you get in the shuttle. Which is a short game for EA. Great time killer and game play though, i play it on the metro everyday
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best game ever
reviews.comment: Beautiful graphics, perfect controls, same game play as console ME. Plays smooth on my my touch. Love that it doesn\'t require active network.
reviews.author: Michael Johnson

reviews.title: Great graphics and game  but constantly crashing on my nexus 7
reviews.comment: I love this game but it keeps crashing and freezing in almost each level.... Hope its fixed asap.. Nexus 7 / 4.2.2 non rooted..
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I have the galaxys3 and the graphics look incredible on this. The game itself is really well done. Great storyline and voice acting. I highly reccomend it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Blah!
reviews.comment: It would be so much better if the endings didn\'t take 10 times to beat all due to bugs I hate the last mech its retarded. The top part disappeares and then it freezes when I\'m about to kill it its an epic game endings are crap due to bugs
reviews.author: Zack Barnaby

reviews.title: Unresponsive on Nexus 7
reviews.comment: Every time I play it.. about 4 mins into the game the system becomes slow and unresponsive. Would have been a great game experience if the system could keep up with it.. its a quad core system. What a shame its not keeping up on the nexus.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Ogre mech bug
reviews.comment: Good gamebut I found a bug when fighting the Ogre Much and I can\'t get passed because of it. His top part get removed so you only see his legs and i cant hurt him. I\'m on a Nexus 7
reviews.author: Josh Balingit

reviews.title: Awesome, but...
reviews.comment: This is a great game!  But my Moto Atrix HD is seemingly not strong enough to play it! Works great on the Note 2.
reviews.author: Scott E Baboyian

reviews.title: Mass Effect
reviews.comment: What a mass effect once upgraded the game does not even load on my note two I don\'t like given my hard earn money up I feel like I\'m rob out of my money.  Then they wonder why people pirate software not even worth a rating I have spent over 100s of dollars for games to just fall short of not working discrental gamer!
reviews.author: NachonShebaniah BennHaniah

reviews.title: AWESOME!
reviews.comment: Very good game UI is superb very fluid high quality gameplay worth every penny every game should be at these standards on android! Galaxy S3  T999
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: WTF
reviews.comment: I want my money back I get a error sign then tells me my phone isnt authorized to play this app what a ripoff I want my money back please
reviews.author: Sye Smallwood
